table.caption: Azorius Adventure Hooks
rows: A {@creature precognitive mage|GGR} has identified the characters as future criminals, and now there's a warrant out for their arrest.
A {@creature precognitive mage|GGR} has foreseen the characters' future struggles and tries to protect them, thereby interfering in their next adventure.
{@creature Felidar|GGR|Felidars} have bonded with the wrong person and now track an innocent citizen.
Hussars—Azorius {@creature Soldier|GGR|soldiers}  mounted on {@creature Griffon||griffons}—declare martial law in a neighborhood and enforce their harsh authority on the citizenry.
An {@creature archon of the Triumvirate|GGR} interprets innocent actions as illegal ones because its connection to the law has been corrupted.
A missing {@creature homunculus} is the sole witness to the murder of a judge.
